Landing.headline: Hanul: Your Intelligent AI Agent Service
Landing.philosophyLead: Stop spending energy on prompts. Focus on outcomes. Hanul’s main agent improves prompts through sub agents, better understanding your intent and delivering better results.
Landing.humanFocusDesc: Skip prompt engineering and simply state what you want.
Landing.mainAgentDesc: The main agent creates and coordinates sub agents, continuously refining prompts.
Landing.subAgentsDesc: With refined prompts, sub agents understand users better and produce sharper results.
Landing.manifestoLead: We help humans rely less on AI. People invest energy in outcomes; AI self-improves prompts to deliver better results.
Landing.manifesto1: We refuse to let “prompt” become the goal. Humans aim for outcomes; AI fills the gap in between.
Landing.manifesto2: Sub agents learn through interaction, compose context, and shorten the distance between question and answer.
Landing.manifesto3: You explain less and achieve more. The system does the repetition; you make the decisions.
Landing.manifestoQuote: Humans set direction; AI refines the path. Hanul removes the friction in between.
Landing.flowIntent: Intent: precisely understand goals and context
Landing.flowOrchestrate: Orchestrate: main agent configures sub agents
Landing.flowRefine: Refine: continuously improve prompts via interaction
Landing.flowSubhead: From intent to outcome, Hanul self-improves prompts via orchestration.
Landing.flow2Desc: Main agent assembles the right sub agents
Landing.flow4Desc: Check results and automatically fill the gaps
Landing.flow5Desc: Merge outputs into a single coherent artifact
Landing.flow6Desc: Faster outputs with higher signal and context
Landing.exampleLead: Main & sub agents co-refine prompts to deliver better results.
Landing.exampleRawContent: A single line capturing only intent
Landing.exampleResultContent: Aligned context, less noise, more actionable
Landing.ctaBannerDesc: Sign up now and try all features freely.
